property.name: abstract
property.label: Abstract
property.description: Adds further context to the title when required.

property.name: content
property.label: Content
property.description: Panel content in Markdown format, leave empty to get a slot in LWR.
property.default: Berios sim destrum facientota nis ex eost aut prae vendis explam aliquis dolorpo rrorem reptaep elenis net.

property.name: icon
property.label: Icon
property.description: Font Awesome icon CSS class. Leave empty if no icon is desired.

property.name: image
property.label: Image source
property.description: URL of the image. Leave empty if no image is desired.

property.name: cta
property.label: Call to Action link
property.description: Call to Action link in Markdown link format. Used when link type is cta.

property.name: buttonPrimary
property.label: Button (primary)
property.description: Primary button link in Markdown link format. Used when link type is button; leave empty if no primary is required.

property.name: buttonSecondary
property.label: Button (secondary)
property.description: Secondary button link in Markdown link format. Used when link type is button; leave empty if no secondary is required.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
